body.p:
Wine 0.9.6 is now available for download. The following changes were noted in the announcement:
A bunch of OLE fixes and improvements.
DirectSound improvements, including full duplex support.
Fix for the Windows metafile vulnerability.
Many static control improvements.
Some fixes for copy protection support.

Binary packages are in the process of being built, but the source is available now. You can find out more about this release in the announcement. Check out our download page for packages for your favorite distribution.
